title: Spacemen 3 & the Birth of the Spiritualized
description: This is the warts-and-all story of Spacemen 3 - the backwater band forged from the collaborations of Pete 'Sonic Boom' Kember and Jason 'Spaceman' Pierce. Erik Morse's book recounts the highs and lows of a fringe outfit whose brief history was characterized by excess, overdose, ambition and the hypnotic trance of tremolo drones.
author: Erik Morse
